overview.en: ZuCoinChain was Launched in October 2019 by a Team Based in Thailand.ZuCoinChain is ever growing UK-regulated company that has created all-in-one cryptocurrency ecosystem. ZuCoin is a blockchain based investment platform with a chain of projects.The one-stop fintech platform offers a full range of financial services and Utilities within ZuChains Products; Zulufinance.com , ZuChain's Crypto Wallet , ZuChain Dex , ZuChain Gaming and ZuFlix. Zuchain's platform has resolved a challenging issue and made a All In One Cryptocurrency Ecosystem.
